name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 9251 Alderbridge Way, Richmond, BC V6X 0N1

featured_reviews.review_id:
McDonald's has always been a go-to spot for me when I'm craving some good comfort food. The taste and quality of their food consistently great.The atmosphere is pretty chill, whether I'm grabbing a quick bite or hanging out with friends. It's got that classic McDonald's vibe that's both nostalgic.

Now, when it comes to service, it's a bit of slow. Sometimes things run smoothly and the staff is friendly, but there have been a few instances where I've encountered slow service or slight mistakes in my order. That's why I'm giving it a 3-star rating for service.

McDonald's still gets a thumbs up from me. The food and vibe are top-notch, and even with some service hiccups, it's a spot I'll keep coming back to this address
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.review_id:
Head offices & Regional Managers
*PAY Attention*

Had to reduce the stars  I frequent this location multiple times a week to check the conditions of this location.

I've worked in this industry for decades and I manage properties. I'm also a safety, and food safety and security inspections officer for multi billion dollar corporations.

Unfortunately, I know when a venue isn't managed properly.

This location is busy, MacDonalds app keeps sending offers to Walmart McDonald's creating congestion and traffic.

This location is frequently understaffed, with a high turnover rate. Resulting in poor quality service, uncleanliness, long wait times, and disgusting, dirty places with flies buzzing everywhere.

The self-serve soda machine and ketchup  dispenser is frequently neglected resulting in a mess, or emptied, or lack of ice. This further causes more congestion as patrons now have to come up to the countertops to request for ketchup, lids , ice or soda.

This location's managers and supervisors need to be on top of this every hour on the hour.

The tables need to be cleaned, especially during rush hours.

Any MacDonald that has flies buzzing around is a result of staff NOT cleaning properly for weeks on end!

Another serious issue is the quality of the oil
*See picture*

The oil is overly burnt and brown or black, it taste that way also and anything coming out of the deep fryer taste disgusting.
I'm fully aware of what is required to clean the oil fryer and how often the oil needs to be changed.

I can tell you this has not been done properly, the oil is over used.  I can tell without even having to visit the kitchen to take a look at the fryer.

Fix these issues before I report this location to authorities.

featured_reviews.review_id: Small!!! This is a tight McDonald's! They could've designed this part of the building a bit better. Service is good and food is about the same as all other McDonald's. It's just the area that I can't handle. Every time I pass by the area, it just discourages me to go in.
featured_reviews.review_text: Small!!! This is a tight McDonald's! They could've designed this part of the building a bit better. Service is good and food is about the same as all other McDonald's. It's just the area that I can't handle. Every time I pass by the area, it just discourages me to go in.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Thanks to Megan, an a employee there.
I was struggling at the kiosk with my account code and she help me through it. She said she worked there and was getting off her shift. She was so nice to me and wanted to help me. I am very grateful that she help me out. I want to give her great review on how she help a customer who was struggling. Thank you again Megan.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Great work Sheldon! We came in on Sunday Aug 21 and he was managing the front counter and packing orders. He is sure a multitasker and a great employee. He managed very well as it was quite busy and he was all alone. I hope your manager or boss reads this and can give you recognition or a raise. Definitely well deserved!

Subtracted a star as the food quality is not that great

featured_reviews.review_id:
1 star for its convenience location and fair food quality it serves.
Often long wait due to short staffed
Do not order their coffee. I repeated, do not order their hot coffee. Tricked me a few times on my take out order , either my double double came in black, or they taste like water - not sure if they follow instruction on brewing coffee or they reuse the same batch for 2-3 times - if that was under management instruction, they need to be reviewed.

featured_reviews.review_id: This service is usually slower than the other McDonalds. The crew always seems like they are new and mess things up. The cleanliness is below the average. However, considering this restaurant is located in Walmart, it might be extra busy. It is good to have it here for those who want to have a break after shopping.

However, considering this restaurant is located in Walmart, it might be extra busy. It is good to have it here for those who want to have a break after shopping.

featured_reviews.review_id: This is a limited McDonald's that doesn't have most drinks on the mcafe menu. They only have plain coffee and tea. It's a standard McDonald's otherwise. The minion theme banana sugar Kookie was good.
featured_reviews.review_text: This is a limited McDonald's that doesn't have most drinks on the mcafe menu. They only have plain coffee and tea. It's a standard McDonald's otherwise. The minion theme banana sugar Kookie was good.
